title: Tigray fighters in Ethiopia reject cease-fire as 'sick joke'
content:
1. Tigray fighters in Ethiopia reject cease-fire as 'sick joke'  The Associated Press
  2. Rebels in Tigray reject calls for ceasefire after Ethiopian government forces withdraw from regional capital  CNN
  3. Tigray Rebels in Ethiopia Celebrate a Victory  The New York Times
  4. The looming famine in Tigray is an avoidable catastrophe  The Guardian
  5. The emotional toll of reporting Ethiopia's Tigray conflict  The New Humanitarian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: エチオピアのティグライ族の戦闘員が停戦を「病的なジョーク」と拒否。
埃塞俄比亚的提格雷战士拒绝停火，认为是 "病态的玩笑"。
埃塞俄比亞的提格雷戰士拒絕停火，認爲是 "病態的玩笑"。
